description: Enjoy top-quality Emilian cuisine at this restaurant, which focuses on the region’s most traditional, best-known and authentic recipes. Featuring a superb selection of hams and salamis, fresh pastas, meat and desserts, the menu offers a real feast for the tastebuds that will linger long in the memory.
